code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SalaryHistory=()=>{const[salaryHistory,setSalaryHistory]=useState([]);const[message,setMessage]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const fetchSalaryHistory=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");const response=await axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/employee/salary/history/",{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});setSalaryHistory(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching salary history",error);setMessage("Failed to fetch salary history.");}};fetchSalaryHistory();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Salary History"}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message}),salaryHistory.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{border:"1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Basic Salary"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Allowances"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Deductions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Net Salary"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:salaryHistory.map((salary,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:salary.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:["$",salary.basic]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:["$",salary.allowances]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:["$",salary.deductions]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:["$",salary.net_salary]})]},index))})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No salary history available."})]});};export default SalaryHistory;
